publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-318 John Park: Aircraft Carriers at Rosyth and Clyde Yardsâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the UK Government to build two new aircraft carriers and the positive impact that this will have for yards at Rosyth and on the Clyde; recognises that this decision is testament to the highly-skilled and committed workforce at the shipyards, and applauds the constructive approach to workplace issues, alongside robust political campaigning, undertaken by the trade unions and the workforce at the yards since privatisation. Supported by: Sarah Boyack*, Liam McArthur*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Stefan Tymkewycz*, James Kelly*, Ken Macintosh*, Charlie Gordon*, Claire Baker*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Michael McMahon*, Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*, Murdo Fraser*, Des McNulty*, Bill Butler*
S3M-318 Aircraft Carriers at Rosyth and Clyde Yards (lodged on 26 July 2007) George Foulkes*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Iain Gray*, Andy Kerr*, Karen Gillon*, David Whitton*
S3M-318 Aircraft Carriers at Rosyth and Clyde Yards (lodged on 26 July 2007) Cathie Craigie*
S3M-318 Aircraft Carriers at Rosyth and Clyde Yards (lodged on 26 July 2007) Pauline McNeill*
